10.10.109.77/28


               10.10.109.77  = 00001010.00001010.01101101.01001101
        /28= 255.255.255.240 = 11111111.11111111.11111111.11110000

00001010.00001010.01101101.0100 1101
11111111.11111111.11111111.1111 0000

Network Address:
00001010.00001010.01101101.0100 0000=10.10.109.64




28 - 8(Class A) => 20 bits are borrowed from host portion

Number of Subnets possible => 2^20 => 1048576

Number of host bits remaining available => 24(default) - 20(subnetbits) => 4 bits

Number of Hosts possbile in each subnet => (2^4)-2 => 16-2 => 14

Firt Host Address => 00001010.00001010.01101101.0100 0001=>10.10.109.65 

Last Host Address => 00001010.00001010.01101101.0100 1110 =>10.10.109.78

Previous Subnet Address:
 
00001010.00001010.01101101.0011 0000=>10.10.109.48

Next Subnet Address:
00001010.00001010.01101101.0101 0000=>10.10.109.80


Broadcast Address:
00001010.00001010.01101101.0100 1111=> 10.10.109.79

Previous IP Address to the current host(IP) address:

00001010.00001010.01101101.01001100 =>10.10.109.76

Next IP Address to the current host(IP) address:
